author: Daniel Greene
description:
What’s HOT in fantasy this year? In this video, we dive into Reddit’s most upvoted, most talked-about, and most loved fantasy books of 2025. Whether you're looking to build your next TBR or want to see if your favorites made the cut, these are the books real fantasy readers are raving about.
Check out the results here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1jjif55/rfantasy_top_novels_2025_results/ 

From epic worldbuilding and grimdark action to cozy magic and breakout debuts, this list covers it all. Based on the r/Fantasy community's reactions, reviews, and yearly vote threads, here's what fantasy fans are truly obsessed with right now.
📚 Check Out My Books:
Neon Ghosts: A Witch's Sin Hardcover: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcover

title: Reddit's Top Fantasy Books Of 2025!
